com.linecorp.armeria.testing.server

Class SelfSignedCertificateRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      • com.linecorp.armeria.testing.server.SelfSignedCertificateRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class SelfSignedCertificateRule
extends org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
    A TestRule that provides a temporary self-signed certificate.
